title: Three Cheese Stuffed Courgettes
ingredients: ['2 courgettes, halved lengthways', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '125g ricotta cheese', '4 tablespoons grated mozzarella cheese', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper']
